typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		dim_nome as string,
		dim_id as integer,
		grv_name as string,
		grv_id as string,
		subzona as string,
		zona as string,
		{paÃ­s} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> RhHierarRAW
RhHierarRAW select(mapColumn(
		dim_id,
		dim_nome,
		grv_name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> EliminaColunasOrdemFim
EliminaColunasOrdemFim sink(input(
		Column_1 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['Rh_Hierar_SILVER.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SinktoRhHierarSILVER
